description.zh-cn: 台湾商人及前公务员。曾任台湾省政府建设厅工程师及住宅及都市发展局处长，后从商担任凯聚集团、茂凯公司董事长，亦曾任德发慈善基金董事长。其子为政治人物傅崐萁。曾因在1997年亚洲金融风暴期间违反公司法，于2010年被判处缓刑。
description.en: Taiwanese businessman and former civil servant. He served as an engineer in the Department of Construction and a director of the Housing and Urban Development Bureau of the Taiwan Provincial Government. He later entered business as the chairman of Kai Chu Group and Mao Kai Company, and also served as chairman of the De Fa Charitable Foundation. His son is the politician Fu Kun-chi. He received a suspended sentence in 2010 for violating company law during the 1997 Asian financial crisis.

description.zh-cn: 傅兆林之妻。
description.en: Wife of Fu Zhaolin.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，傅兆林之子。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, son of Fu Zhaolin.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，傅兆林之儿媳。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, daughter-in-law of Fu Zhaolin.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾高雄市的一所高级中学，傅兆林曾就读于此。
description.en: A senior high school in Kaohsiung, Taiwan, where Fu Zhaolin studied.

nodes.id: 高雄市立高雄高级工业职业学校

zh-cn: 高雄市立高雄高级工业职业学校

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾高雄市的一所高级工业职业学校，傅兆林毕业于此。
description.en: A senior industrial vocational high school in Kaohsiung, Taiwan, from which Fu Zhaolin graduated.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京的顶尖理工科大学，傅兆林曾在此留学。
description.en: A top science and technology university in Tokyo, Japan, where Fu Zhaolin studied abroad.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省的最高行政机关，傅兆林曾在此任职。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Taiwan Province, Republic of China, where Fu Zhaolin once worked.

description.zh-cn: 台湾省政府下设的部门，傅兆林曾在此任职。
description.en: A department under the Taiwan Provincial Government where Fu Zhaolin worked.

description.zh-cn: 台湾省政府下设的部门，傅兆林曾在此任职。
description.en: A department under the Taiwan Provincial Government where Fu Zhaolin worked.

description.zh-cn: 1947年发生于台湾的官民冲突事件，傅兆林曾亲身经历高雄地区的镇压。
description.en: An anti-government uprising in Taiwan in 1947. Fu Zhaolin personally experienced the suppression in the Kaohsiung area.

description.zh-cn: 1997年爆发的一场席卷亚洲的金融危机。
description.en: A financial crisis that swept across Asia starting in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 日治台湾高雄州旗山郡下辖的行政区，现为高雄市美浓区。为傅兆林的出生地。
description.en: An administrative district under Kizan District, Takao Prefecture, during the Japanese rule of Taiwan, now Meinong District, Kaohsiung City. It is the birthplace of Fu Zhaolin.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾花莲县的县辖市，为傅兆林的逝世地。
description.en: A county-administered city in Hualien County, Taiwan, where Fu Zhaolin passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省的县，傅兆林曾在此工作并主导重大基础建设。
description.en: A county in Taiwan Province, Republic of China, where Fu Zhaolin worked and led major infrastructure projects.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省的县，傅兆林曾在此主导重大基础建设。
description.en: A county in Taiwan Province, Republic of China, where Fu Zhaolin led major infrastructure projects.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国副总统。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Vice President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国副总统。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Vice President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，亲民党主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, Chairman of the People First Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中国国民党主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任民主进步党主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任行政院长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Premier of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任立法院长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former President of the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党立法院党团总召集人。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, convener of the Democratic Progressive Party caucus in the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，大甲镇澜宫董事长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, Chairman of the Dajia Jenn Lann Temple.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前苗栗县长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Magistrate of Miaoli County.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前花莲县长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Magistrate of Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前花莲县长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Magistrate of Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前花莲县长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Magistrate of Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前台东县长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Magistrate of Taitung County.

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚是傅兆林的儿媳。
description.en: Hsu Chen-wei is Fu Zhaolin's daughter-in-law.

relationships.target: 高雄市立高雄高级工业职业学校

position.zh-cn: 重机械工程大队队员、工程司、副工程司、正工程司
position.en: Member of Heavy Machinery Engineering Brigade, Engineer, Deputy Engineer, Senior Engineer

description.zh-cn: 18岁时经公务人员普考分发至台湾省政府建设厅，曾担任中部六县市美援自来水供水系统兴建工程督导。
description.en: At the age of 18, he was assigned to the Department of Construction of the Taiwan Provincial Government after passing the civil service examination. He served as the construction supervisor for the US-aided water supply system in six central counties and cities.

position.en: Director of the Eastern District Engineering Office

description.zh-cn: 傅兆林在就读高雄中学时亲身经历二二八事件中的高雄镇压。
description.en: Fu Zhaolin personally experienced the Kaohsiung suppression during the February 28 Incident while studying at Kaohsiung Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 在1997年亚洲金融风暴期间，为保持公司股价，傅兆林私自贷款给子公司，此举违反公司法并导致其后来被判刑。
description.en: During the 1997 Asian financial crisis, to maintain his company's stock price, Fu Zhaolin privately lent money to a subsidiary, which violated company law and led to his subsequent conviction.

description.zh-cn: 担任台湾省政府住宅及都市发展局东区工程处长期间，主导花莲县的重大基础建设。
description.en: While serving as the Director of the Eastern District Engineering Office of the Housing and Urban Development Bureau of the Taiwan Provincial Government, he led major infrastructure projects in Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 担任台湾省政府住宅及都市发展局东区工程处长期间，主导台东县的重大基础建设。
description.en: While serving as the Director of the Eastern District Engineering Office of the Housing and Urban Development Bureau of the Taiwan Provincial Government, he led major infrastructure projects in Taitung County.

description.zh-cn: 出席傅兆林告别式并致哀。
